title: Marketing Strategy
desc: Empowering your brand with data-driven insights and strategic audits for optimal growth.
largedesc: At Audienze Labs, our Marketing Strategy services focus on providing comprehensive audits and strategic guidance to help you optimize your marketing efforts. We start with a Market Discovery Audit to deeply understand your audience and the competitive landscape.

Our Search Engine Marketing Audit evaluates your online presence and provides actionable recommendations for improvement. Through our Campaign Strategy Audit, we review your existing marketing campaigns and provide insights on how to optimize them for better performance.
Finally, with our Paid Marketing Strategy Audit, we assess your paid advertising efforts and offer strategies to maximize your return on investment.

body.title: 1. Market Discovery Audit
parrafo: This phase focuses on conducting an in-depth analysis of your market landscape, target audience, and competitors to inform your overall marketing strategy.

list.title: Audience Research Audit: ($1,000 - $2,000)
list.txt: Evaluate your target audience’s demographics, behaviors, preferences, and pain points to ensure your marketing strategy aligns with their needs.

list.title: Competitor Analysis Audit: ($1,000 - $2,000)
list.txt: Conducting a comprehensive review of your competitors’ marketing strategies to identify opportunities for differentiation.

list.title: SWOT Analysis Audit: ($1,000 - $2,000)
list.txt: Analyzing your brand’s strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats to provide strategic recommendations.

list.title: Market Trend Analysis Audit: ($1,500 - $2,500)
list.txt: Reviewing current and emerging market trends to ensure your strategy is aligned with industry developments.

list.title: Persona Development Audit: ($1,000 - $2,000)
list.txt: Assessing the accuracy and effectiveness of your existing buyer personas and offering suggestions for refinement.

body.title: 2. Search Engine Marketing (SEM) Audit
parrafo: This phase involves a thorough review of your search engine marketing efforts to identify areas for improvement and optimization.

list.title: SEO Audit: ($1,500 - $3,000)
list.txt: Conducting a comprehensive review of your website’s SEO performance, including keyword usage, on-page optimization, and backlink profile.

list.title: Keyword Research Audit: ($1,000 - $2,000)
list.txt: Analyzing the effectiveness of your current keyword strategy and identifying opportunities for improvement.

list.title: On-Page SEO Audit: ($1,500 - $3,000)
list.txt: Reviewing your website’s content, meta tags, images, and internal linking structure to enhance search engine visibility.

list.title: Off-Page SEO Audit: ($1,500 - $3,500)
list.txt: Evaluating your backlink profile and off-site SEO efforts to recommend improvements.

list.title: PPC Campaign Audit: ($2,000 - $4,000)
list.txt: Reviewing your pay-per-click campaigns, including ad copy, targeting, and bidding strategies, to identify optimization opportunities.

list.title: Conversion Rate Optimization Audit: ($1,500 - $3,000)
list.txt: Assessing your website’s user experience and conversion paths to improve the percentage of visitors who become customers.

body.title: 3. Campaign Strategy Audit
parrafo: This phase is dedicated to reviewing and optimizing your existing marketing campaigns, offering strategic insights and recommendations for improvement.

list.title: Campaign Planning & Strategy Audit: (Custom pricing based on scope)
list.txt: Reviewing your current campaign strategies, including goals, KPIs, and channel selection, to provide strategic recommendations for improvement.

list.title: Campaign Optimization Audit: ($1,500 - $3,000 per campaign)
list.txt: Evaluating your campaign’s performance and offering insights on how to improve targeting, messaging, and overall effectiveness.

list.title: Campaign Analytics & Reporting Audit: (Custom pricing based on frequency and detail)
list.txt: Analyzing campaign performance data to identify trends, strengths, and areas for improvement, and providing actionable recommendations.

body.title: 4. Paid Marketing Strategy Audit
parrafo: This phase focuses on reviewing your paid advertising efforts, and providing strategic recommendations to optimize your budget and maximize ROI.

list.title: Paid Campaign Strategy Audit: (Custom pricing based on scope)
list.txt: Reviewing your overall paid marketing strategy, including budget allocation, targeting, and channel selection, to provide strategic insights.

list.title: Ad Creative Audit: ($1,500 - $3,000 per ad)
list.txt: Evaluating the effectiveness of your ad creatives across platforms like Google Ads, Facebook, and Instagram, and recommending improvements.

list.title: Campaign Setup & Execution Audit: (Custom pricing based on platform and scope)
list.txt: Reviewing your campaign setup, including targeting, bidding, and execution, to identify areas for optimization.

list.title: A/B Testing & Optimization Audit: ($1,000 - $2,500 per test)
list.txt: Assessing your A/B testing processes and results, and providing recommendations for more effective testing and optimization.

list.title: Campaign Monitoring & Reporting Audit: (Custom pricing based on frequency and detail)
list.txt: Reviewing your campaign monitoring and reporting processes, offering suggestions for more effective tracking and analysis.

list.title: Retargeting Strategy Audit: ($1,500 - $3,000 per campaign)
list.txt: Evaluating your retargeting campaigns and providing insights on how to better re-engage visitors who have interacted with your brand.
